Title: Increases the total dollar amount of outstanding parking tickets required to trigger vehicle removal and impoundment in New York city to $550
Summary: Increases the total dollar amount of outstanding parking tickets required to trigger vehicle removal and impoundment in New York city to $550 and deems the owner a scofflaw.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-212, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing total dollar amount of outstanding parking violations and deeming the owner a scofflaw
